result.eng: You will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ga: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.orig: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.html: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú ar an ċailín is áille ar doṁanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.

result.html: Cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.
result.ponchtml: Cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.

result.ga: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.orig: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.html: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.

result.ga: Tá an teach seo go hálainn
result.orig: Tá an teach seo go hálainn
result.html: Tá an teach seo go hálainnThis house is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ seo go hálainnThis house is beautiful.

result.ga: Tá an ceantar seo go hálainn

result.html: Tá an ceantar seo go hálainnThis region is beautiful.
